Summary: Exactly like earlier post reported in Florida . Looked like a harvest moon. Except for the fact that the moon was behind me during the sighting.
divs: Sighting DetailsWent outside to walk the dogs. Looked up at the sky to stargaze for a moment. Looking east. I then turned around still looking up a perfectly round ball slowly moving over trees in backyard. Lasted 10 seconds. Looked like a harvest moon. I would say the size of a basketball at arms length. The trees it went behind were about 50 yards away and somewhere around 50' tall.
